attributes.description:
2007 MAZDA MX-5 2.0 SOFT-TOP, ONLY 131 850 KM’S, IMMACULATE CONDITION, SELLING FOR ONLY R 179 950.00 (FACE LIFT) 
Summer is definitely here and I personally don’t think there is a better car you can buy for under 180K that competes with this. These are fantastic sports cars, from the drive, to the handling plus the looks you have yourself a fantastic vehicle. They are also reliable, cost effective to maintain, light on fuel, there is not better feeling in the world like leaving your house at 5 AM taking the roof off and heading out to the dam on the windy roads, which car for this price can give you the same outcome, and answer is not many. 
WHAT MAKES THIS CAR SPECIAL? 
•	For starters just the fact that there are very few clean ones around today and advertised for sale. 
•	low mileage for the year
•	Immaculate condition 
•	Awesome colour combo 
•	Bose surround sound
•	Face Lift 
•	Unbelievable condition 
My suggestion is to make an appointment and come through for a test drive before making any decisions on which one you want to purchase. Guaranteed ours will exceed your expectations. 
WHAT WAS WRONG WITH THIS CAR WHEN WE PURCHASED IT? 
•	The front bumper was covered in stone chips, we have resprayed the front bumper 
•	Full 4 stage paint protection polish and clay bar treatment was done because there were fine scratches around the vehicle. 
•	It’s got partial service history as one or two are missing, 

This vehicle is in amazing condition, the new owner will be very happy with his purchase, don’t miss out, contact us now to arrange an appointment or for any other info

attributes.title: 2012 Toyota Hilux 3.0 D-4D Raider 4x4 Single-Cab

attributes.description:
The Porsche 911 GT3 RS sits just below the GT2 RS within the 911 line up.

One of the most track-focused 911 models that Porsche currently builds and it certainly looks like it has absolutely no place on public roads, even though it is very much road-legal. 

Powered by a four-litre flat six engine producing a whopping 383kW  of power and 470 Newton meters of torque, mated to Porsche's famous PDK gearbox. The GT3 RS sprints from 0 - 100 km/h in just 3.1 thanks to it's sticky Michelin Pilot Sport Cup 2 tyres. 

This immaculate 2019 Porsche 911 GT3 RS with only 3 800km is packed with extras such as:
- Weissach package 
- Titanium roll cage 
- Sports exhaust 
- Sports Chrono package 
- Fire extinguisher 
- Cruise control 
- Interior carbon fiber package 
- Exterior Carbon fiber package 
- Front suspension lift 
- Adaptive suspension 
- Bucket seats 
- Porsche racing harnesses
- Led matrix headlights and much more 
Trade-ins welcome, Finance available
